A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: George Lucas Star Wars created a world in a galaxy far away and you could imagine Luke and everyone still being alive somewhere after their adventure had been told. It is a bit like Peter Pan and Neverland where you could go if you had a space ship that could fly there. Nu-Star Wars is about the real world\, it doesn't even take you off the ground\, it's all grounded in modern politics on planet earth.
